name: FreshPantrySalsa
0:
”Alexa, open fresh pantry salsa”
”Alexa, ask fresh pantry salsa for hot”
”Alexa, ask fresh pantry salsa for a mild salsa recipe”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: fresh pantry salsa
des:
Have some fresh veggies but don't know how to make a salsa ? Now you can ask Alexa how to make 3 simple salsas from everyday items from your pantry or garden. Current recipes include instructions for mild, medium and hot salsas

Say "Alexa open fresh pantry salsa" and follow the prompts. 

Say "Alexa ask fresh pantry salsa for a hot salsa" for a specific recipe.

Icon made by Freepik from www.flaticon.com
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
